author: Amazon Customer

review: Overall I am very disappointed with the amazon fire tv stick.  We bought this for our bedroom to watch Netflix and hbo on and stream other shows.  The stick was very easy to set up and connect to our wireless network but that was about it. Shows are constantly buffering and stopping all together. The wireless connection status is "very good" according to the stick but it does not stream well at all. We have very good internet and have no problem streaming on multiple devices all day long but this will just not work. Even when I shut everything else in the house off it still only streams about 50% of the time. I could understand if our router was on the other side of the house but it is only in the next room about 20ft away. I also tried to cast from my tablet to the stick since I can stream just fine on it but all it does is time out and won't even cast to it. Will probably see if I can get a refund which is a shame because I really enjoy amazon products like my kindle fire but this one just does not work. I am giving it two stars be cause when it does work it works well but those times are few and far between.
